DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind randomized placebo-controlled clinical trial evaluate whether Chinese medicine formula ( Erxian Decoction ) effective alleviate menopausal symptom . This study conduct Queen Mary Hospital Chinese Medicine Clinic cum Training Research Centers University Hong Kong ( Sassoon Road Central ) . Women recruit general population advertisement promotion medium coverage.108 Chinese woman menopausal symptom recruit randomized two groups.One treatment group 12 week Erxian Decoction ( well-controlled granule ) , control group 12 week placebo . The treatment outcome measure include : 1 ) severity menopausal symptom : self-recording daily frequency vasomotor symptom ( hot flush plus night sweat ) , Menopause-Specific Quality Life ( MENQOL ) Questionnaire Menopause Rating Scale ( MRS ) . 2 ) biochemical index : serum follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , estradiol , progesterone level . 3 ) safety index : blood count , liver renal function test . All measure conduct baseline endpoint except self-recoding vasomotor symptom MENQOL Questionnaire , MRS. We expect research provide effective low-cost therapy menopausal symptom .
